title: Pregnancy Weight Gain Calculator
description: Calculate recommended weight gain during pregnancy
metaDescription: Free pregnancy weight gain calculator - Get personalized recommendations based on IOM guidelines according to your pre-pregnancy BMI.

info.title: About Pregnancy Weight Gain
info.description: Weight gain during pregnancy is essential for the health of both mother and baby. The Institute of Medicine (IOM) recommendations vary based on pre-pregnancy BMI and whether it's a twin pregnancy.
info.guidelines: General guidelines: During the first trimester, weight gain is minimal (1-4 lbs). In the second and third trimesters, weight gain is steady and progressive based on BMI category.
info.limitations: This calculator provides general estimates based on IOM guidelines. Always consult with your doctor or healthcare provider for personalized recommendations based on your individual situation.
